Name: Self-Employed
Description: Mercenary companies don't often act on their own behalf, but every once in a while there's something that has to be done, and nobody around who is willing to pay for it.
ReputationStatements: Sometimes you need to take care of company's affairs.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well executed, Commander. I could have done it better myself.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Since there's no compensation, we better cut our losses while we can.
